parameters.name: AlertName
parameters.description: The name of the alert rule.

parameters.name: DispatchRuleId
parameters.description: The ID of the notification policy.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the alert sending history that you want to query. Specify the time in the `YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss` format.

parameters.name: IntegrationType
parameters.description:
The integration type.

*   ARMS
*   CLOUD_MONITOR
*   MSE
*   ARMS_CLOUD_DIALTEST
*   PROMETHEUS
*   LOG_SERVICE
*   CUSTOM
*   ARMS_PROMETHEUS
*   ARMS_APP_MON
*   ARMS_FRONT_MON
*   ARMS_CUSTOM
*   XTRACE
*   GRAFANA
*   ZABBIX
*   SKYWALKING
*   EVENT_BRIDGE
*   NAGIOS
*   OPENFALCON
*   ARMS_INSIGHTS

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: Severity
parameters.description: The severity level of the alert. Valid values: P6, P5, P4, P3, P2, and P1. The preceding values are listed in ascending order of severity.

parameters.name: ShowActivities
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the activities that correspond to alerts. Valid values:

*   `false` (default value): The activities are not queried.
*   `true`: The activities in the last three days are queried.

parameters.name: ShowEvents
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the events that correspond to alerts. Valid values:

*   `false` (default value): The events are not queried.
*   `true`: The events are queried.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: The number of alerts to return on each page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the alert sending history that you want to query. Specify the time in the `YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss` format.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description:
The status of the alert. Valid values:

*   0: The alert is pending.
*   1: The alert is being handled.
*   2: The alert is handled.
